blogPost.title: Vaccines developed in China and Russia may have an important role to play in the fight against covid-19. But a lack of transparency over trial data could erode trust in vaccines https://t.co/1OipbJQg0j
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 中国和俄罗斯研发的疫苗可能在对抗covid-19的过程中发挥重要作用。但试验数据缺乏透明度可能会削弱对疫苗的信任https://t.co/1OipbJQg0j。
中國和俄羅斯研發的疫苗可能在對抗covid-19的過程中發揮重要作用。但試驗數據缺乏透明度可能會削弱對疫苗的信任https://t.co/1OipbJQg0j。

previous.title: We have ranked 90 business schools on their full-time MBA courses, using responses to questions from thousands of current and former students⁠ https://t.co/HDrr3CndUD https://t.co/lhG1Q64Cmc

localize.full_text: 我们通过对数千名在校生和往届生的问题的回答，对90所商学院的全日制MBA课程进行了排名，https://t.co/HDrr3CndUD https://t.co/lhG1Q64Cmc。
我們通過對數千名在校生和往屆生的問題的回答，對90所商學院的全日制MBA課程進行了排名，https://t.co/HDrr3CndUD https://t.co/lhG1Q64Cmc。

next.title: The catalyst for the coup was an election held in November. Aung San Suu Kyi's party won a staggering 83% of seats—but the generals claimed the election was unfair https://t.co/QWegpRhCn6

localize.full_text: 政变的催化剂是11月举行的一次选举。昂山素季的政党赢得了83%的惊人席位，但将军们声称选举不公平，https://t.co/QWegpRhCn6。
政變的催化劑是11月舉行的一次選舉。昂山素季的政黨贏得了83%的驚人席位，但將軍們聲稱選舉不公平，https://t.co/QWegpRhCn6。
